name: Math Pixels
description:
Test your logic and unveil the hidden images in this pixel art puzzle game!

Each level presents a blank canvas surrounded by mysterious numbers. These hold the key to a pixel art image waiting to be discovered. Use your logic and deduction skills to strategically paint the grid, one pixel at a time. Each color choice reveals a piece of the puzzle, bringing the hidden image to life.





Key Features:

  • 200 Handcrafted Levels: Dive into a diverse range of puzzles, from beginner-friendly to mind-bending challenges.
  • Unlock the Secrets at Your Pace: Explore the hidden images at your own speed, with over 3 hours of content waiting to be discovered.
  • 7 Achievements Await: Strive for pixel perfection and unlock every achievement in the game.
  • Puzzle Generator: Experience an infinite puzzle with a random generator creating unique patterns of scattered pixels every time you play.


Are you ready to take on the pixel puzzle challenge?
